duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with stakeholders, data engineers, and business analysts to design and architect data solutions based on the Snowflake cloud data platform.
Lead a team of developers and data engineers, providing technical guidance, mentoring, and support throughout the development lifecycle.
Develop and maintain data integration workflows to ingest, process, and transform data from various sources into Snowflake.
Optimize Snowflake database performance by tuning queries, optimizing data structures, and improving data loading and extraction processes.
Implement and enforce data security measures, access controls, and data governance policies within Snowflake.
Work closely with cloud infrastructure teams to ensure the Snowflake environment is properly configured, monitored, and scaled to meet performance and availability requirements.
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Snowflake and cloud technologies. Propose and implement improvements to enhance the overall data architecture and development processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in IT or related fields (Master’s preferred)
